com.epoch.lewis

Class LewisMolecule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.lewis.LewisMolecule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChemConstants, FormatConstants, LewisConstants

    public class LewisMolecule
extends Object
implements LewisConstants
    Encodes a molecule with unshared electrons associated with each atom. Imports the molecule from an MRV or extended MOL representation. The line in the MOL string that indicates unshared electrons has the format: 
    M  LNE  2   1   4   2   2

    where the first number indicates the number of atoms with unshared electrons, and each subsequent pair of numbers indicates the 1-based atom index and the number of electrons on that atom. There can be more than one such line, but they should be consecutive.

      • setTotalUnsharedElectrons

        public final void setTotalUnsharedElectrons()
        Calculates the total number of unshared electrons in this Lewis molecule.

      • setUnsharedElectrons

        private final void setUnsharedElectrons()
        Gets the number of unshared electrons of each atom from an MRV or MOL string and calculates the total number of electrons. The line in the MOL string that indicates unshared electrons has the format: 
        M  LNE  2   4   2  15   4

        where the first number indicates the number of atoms with unshared electrons, and each subsequent pair of numbers indicates the 1-based atom index and the number of electrons on that atom. There can be more than one such line, but they should be consecutive.

      • getCellValue

        private Integer getCellValue(String line,
                             int posn)
        Utility class for setUnsharedElectrons(). Gets the value of one cell in the MOL line.
        Parameters:
        line - line of the MOL file
        posn - position of the cell in the line
        Returns:
        Integer value of the cell
